div.div: At-Home learning to continue through the end of the 2019-2020 school year. Please visit www.killeenisd.org/covid19 for more information.

img.title: KISD-TV adds Spanish Bilingual Lessons for Elementary Students!

div.a: KISD-TV adds Spanish Bilingual Lessons for Elementary Students!

div.p: Families can tune in on Wednesdays, starting tomorrow, at 8:00 a.m. until 3:00 p.m. for pre-kindergarten through fifth-grade lessons in Spanish.

div.p: The 10 top KISD high school Class of 2020 graduates received surprise visits from their principals.

td.p: Teach so that students learn to their maximum potential.

div.p: Through the implementation of a full, innovative, rigorous, comprehensive education program [...]
Learning resources for students, parent resources and quick links.

img.alt: teachers handing out food to children in a car
img.title: Grab & Go Meals

span.style: color: rgb(69, 69, 69); font-family: Arial, "open sans", "sans serif";

span.span: Beginning Tuesday, March 17, free breakfast and free lunch will be served each day to ALL children ages 0-18 during the district-wide closure due to COVID-19.

span.style: color: rgb(69, 69, 69); font-family: Arial, "open sans", "sans serif"; font-size: 14px;

img.alt: A student working at a desk, Talking With Children About Coronavirus
img.title: Talking With Children About Coronavirus

div.p: Parents, here is some information that may help you discuss the Coronovirus with your child. Our hope is to relieve any anxious feelings or confusion our students may be experiencing during the COVID 19 situation.

a.font: Link to ASL Version on Youtube

span.style: color: rgb(104, 105, 105); font-family: Arial, "open sans", "sans serif"; font-size: 14px;

p.span:
Killeen ISD is adding to its Continued Learning Center with lessons for elementary students available for viewing on TV!
Spanish bilingual lessons are also available!

span.style: color: rgb(104, 105, 105); font-family: Arial, "open sans", "sans serif"; font-size: 14px;

img.title: KISD Launches College & Career Transition Hotline

div.span: KISD Launches College & Career Transition Hotline
div.p: Killeen ISD launched a College and Career Transition Hotline for Killeen ISD high school students. The hotline is available from 9:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m. every Tuesday through Thursday.

Our mission remains unchanged, Teach so that students learn to their maximum potential. Despite COVID-19 school closure, through a continued learning plan and the remote support of our teachers, students will continue learning at home as we work to reopen schools.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 15px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: none; outline: none; position: relative; color: rgb(33, 33, 33); font-size: 18px; text-decoration-line: inherit; font-family: "Droid Sans"; line-height: 1.6;

img.alt: elementary aged children on a stage
img.title: Pre-K & Kindergarten Round Up

div.p:
Round-Up is an opportunity for parents/guardians to pre-register their Pre-K or Kindergarten student for the 2020-2021 school year.
Online Registration: May 18 - 22, 2020 (Link will be provided soon.)
To find your home campus and read about program eligibility, please visit our information page.

img.alt: KISD seal on a blue background with a white line in the center
img.title: 2020-2021 Transfer Requests

div.p:
Transfer requests for the 2020-2021 school year will open March 16, 2020 and will close June 26, 2020.
More information will be available by clicking the link below.

div.a: The Military Child's Creed by Meadows ES

Texas Bioscience Institute Middle College Program

div.p: The Killeen Independent School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, gender, disability, or age in its programs and activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies: Professional Standards Administrator, 200 North WS Young Drive, Killeen, TX. 76543, 254-336-0000.

KISD no discrimina contra raza, color, origen nacional, género, incapacidad o edad en sus programas y actividades. La siguiente persona ha sido designada para contestar preguntas relacionadas con la póliza de discriminación: Administrador de Estandartes Profesionales 200 North WS Young Drive, Killeen, TX 76543, 254-336-0000.

Der unabhängige Schulbezirk von Killeen (Killeen Independent School District) erlaubt in seimen Progammen und Aktivitäten keine Diskriminierungen basierend auf Rasse, Hautfarbe, nationaler Herkunft, Geschelecht, Behinderung oder Alter. Die folgende Person steht im Fall von Fragen zur Richtlinie der Nicht-Diskriminierung zur Verfügung: Professional Standards Administrator 200 North W S Young Drive, Killeen, TX 76543, 254-336-0000.
킬린 교육구는 그 해당 프로그램 및 활동에 있어서 인종, 피부, 국가, 성별, 신체장애 및 연령등을 기준으로 한 차별을 하지 않는다. 이에 따라, 무차별 정책을 취급하도록 다음과 같은 전문 행정 관리인이 지명되었다: 전문 행정 관리인 200 North W.S. Young Drive, Killeen, TX 76543, 254-336-0000.
